name: Maintenance
description: A maintenance service for cyborgs and androids.
effect: With the GM's permission, this [Item] may be purchased once per scene while [Appearing]. However, it can only be used [Out of Combat], and only by [Class: Mechanical] characters. Use as [Range: User / Target: User]. The target recovers 10 HP.

name: Nutrition Capsule
description: A sacramental nutrition capsule created through compounding a special spiritual drug. One can stay active for three days with just one tablet.

name: Restore Paste
description: A sacramental restoration nanopaste applied to wounds.
effect: Use on one engaged target. The target recovers 10 HP. If the target is Class: Machine, they recover an additional 5 HP.

name: Power Grenade
description: A hand grenade made via a sacramental technique.
effect: Use as a weapon attack with [Ranged Attack / Range: Strength Sq. / Target: Area] and +1 rank. Do not apply the PD of your equipped weapon to this attack.

name: Stardust Hourglass
description: The powder of a meteorite made into a spiritual drug, then placed inside of an hourglass. It only works when it's shattered.
effect: Use it on yourself as Unique Timing. Increase your Initiative by +1d6 until the end of the round.

name: Rocket Launcher
effect: Use as a weapon attack with [Ranged Attack / Range: 10 Sq. / Target: Area] and +3 rank. This Consumable may only be used as a Attack Timing. Do not apply your combat stats or the PD of your equipped weapon to this attack.

name: Panacea
description: A high-quality panacea created with mistletoe.
effect: Use on one engaged target. The target may remove all of the following conditions: blinded, poisoned, pained, paralyzed.

name: Tengu's Rice Ball
description: Spirit energy crystals made into a rice ball. It can be eaten.
effect: Use on one engaged target. The target may remove the following conditions: blinded, poisoned. Additionally, they recover 20 HP.

name: Holy Wafer
description: A kind of spiritual drug believed to have been created by a great Heroic Spirit. Its method of creation is only taught within the <Church>.
